title: "Software setup"
format: html
---

I am using `sh conda --version` to manage software environments. The YAML files for the conda environments are in `software/conda`

```{sh, echo=FALSE eval=FALSE}
# Dir for conda ymls
mkdir -p software/conda

# R 4.4.2 and some useful packages
conda create -n r-4.4.2 -c conda-forge  -c bioconda -c defaults \
    r-base=4.4.2 \
    r-essentials \
    r-quarto \
    r-irkernel \
    ipykernel \
    r-httpgd \
    r-svglite \
    r-tidyverse \
    r-rcolorbrewer \
    r-scales \
    r-ggnewscale \
    r-patchwork \
    r-ggbeeswarm \
    r-cowplot \
    r-igraph \
    r-data.table \
    r-biocmanager \
    r-languageserver

# Export YMLs
conda env export --name r-4.4.2 --from-history | sed "s|^prefix.*||" > software/conda/r-4.4.2.yml # I added the version numbers manually
```

Install the conda environments from the YMLs

```{sh}
# Create conda environments from YML file
conda env create -f software/conda/r-4.4.2.yml
```
